content:
I am a second year computer science student at the GRAND OUEST NORMANDIE IUT. I am currently improving in multiple fields of computer science (OOP, full stack web developpement, databases…) and I invite you to check my projects and github account.
I am also fond of rock climbing, fundamental physics (I had the chance to realise a one week internship at the GANIL) and an avid manga or webcomic reader.
summary: I am a second year computer science student at the GRAND OUEST NORMANDIE IUT. I am currently improving in multiple fields of computer science (OOP, full stack web developpement, databases…) and I invite you to check my projects and github account.
title: Arnaud GODET

content:
A project made using the C language, the library “Unity” to make tests units and the integrated socket librairies. It allows you to create a UDP or TCP server, or client, and connect them to send messages. You can also using TCP ask a webserver to get the main page content and then it prints it in the shell.
Exemple of use of the project (connecting TCP server and client ): Click here to see the code / download the project.
summary: In this project the user can make clients or servers and send messages with sockets UDP or TCP
title: Networking in C

Click here to play the game.
A personnal project realised mostly in Javascript with the P5.js library. This is a Space invaders game with some free images, optimised, available online and with some possibilites (change the difficulty, fireworks when you win or lose…) You move with the keyboard arrows and fire by pressing space.
Click here to see the code.
summary: A small game like space invaders made in Javascript, it has different difficulties and a boss
title: Space invaders

content:
This is a 2nd year project from the IUT, we have a client and 2 of our professors as tutors, we work together using git and the Agile method (which means that we make multiple rendering to the client until the final app). Geneanet is a website which host the genealogic trees of 4 million of users, however even if we can watch them (when they are public) for our client a genealogy enthusiast who wants to improve his family tree, it is annoying to rewrite in his software named Heredis every individual. Our job is to make an app which only needs the profil url and a click to get the whole family tree in a Gedcom file that the client can import in his software (Heredis).
The important development steps are :
 make a program able to scrap a profile, which means get the informations of the web page of the profile thanks to the DOM adapt it according to the html-css variations between some pages (some profiles lack specific informations like a date of birth) execute the scraping in recursive way on all the individuals of the tree and save them clean the datas (incorrect dates, bad format for the names…) write the informations under the Gedcom 5.5 format (a very specific format for genealogic files ) make an app that proposes to the user to enter an URL and make all the actions in one clic  Profile example : (this project is still in progress)
Click here to see the code.
summary: A group project for a client who wanted to get the whole family tree from a Geneanet profile into a Gedcom file.
title: Geneanet to gedcom scraping

content:
Click here to see the project.
This was a personnal project that I realised inspiring myself from the tutorial of Dan Shiffman from the channel “The coding Train”. As an user you can make a drawing and send it to the base like here : and then look at the different content of the base, sort them by time or by name :
You can also take a picture with your webcam or ask the website to give you the weather at your location, save it in the base and look at a map with pointers to the locations present in the base.
summary: A website which can tell your location and the weather here and save it to the base along a drawing or picture.
title: NodeJS_WeatherLocation

This project was realized with a classmate for the human-manchine interface class. This was our first project with Javascript and considering the game isn’t responsive it might not work correctly depending on the size of your screen. Nevertheless, this was an interesting experience to use CSS animations for the menu or making the game mechanics work.
Click here to see the code.
summary: One of my first projects using html, css and javascript to make a mastermind game.
title: Mastermind JS

content:
One of my first personnal programming projects which made me discover at the same time Eclipse, Java and Swing a library directly integrated in the Java JDK to make graphical interfaces. It isn’t optimized at all and not very practical to setup (you need to download the last release on github, dezip it and launch the jar file or clone the github repository and put in the folder the correct JRE) but it works fine and have some easter eggs. link to see the releases and download the last one
This project was made before all for fun and have some jokes (especially a mode JUL like the french singer, musics…).
A small presentation of the project : Click here to see the code.
summary: A small personnal project that made me discover Swing to make GUI in Java
title: Java first animation with Swing

content: This was a first year project at the IUT, the purpose was to make in C, in command line, an improved version of the tic-tac-toe game, a bit more complex and give a make file that we can execute in order to compile the program. This project use dependancies only available in Linux, for windows you can use WSL to execute the program (available in the windows app store this allows you to simulate a Linux environnement very easily and fast). A small demonstration of the project launched with WSL : Click here to see the code.
summary: A remix of the tic tac toe making it more complex made using C
title: Tic tac toe remix -> Gobblet Gobblers

content:
Click here to play 
Another personnal project of mine which I started mostly as a joke (making an agario game where you can play with my friends’s faces) but ended up having to learn networking in order to make it playable online and it became a pretty big project. Quick remarks :
 in the game clic in the direction you want to move you can open the game in different tabs to see for yourself how it works with different players have fun !  You can see the code here
summary: A remix of the famous game agario made using node js, you can play with different people and select a skin.
title: agario remix
